string.value: You can earn the #b<Nihal Desert Explorer>#k title by exploring the Nihal Desert.
#b#eTitle - Nihal Desert Explorer#k#n\r\nExplore the 10 main regions of Nihal Desert.\r\n#bâ— Status : #R27015# / 10 Completed.
You have completed exploring Nihal Desert and earned the #b<Nihal Desert Explorer>#k title.
You've finished exploring Nihal Desert. I will grant you the #b<Nihal Desert Explorer>#k title.

Welcome back. How did you enjoy exploring Nihal Desert? I'm sure you were hot and thirsty exploring the desert, but I'm sure you came out with many valuable memories. Besides, I'm granting you the #b<Nihal Desert Explorer>#k title. Aren't you excited? Oh, and keep up the good work as you explore other parts of Maple World!
You haven't finished exploring the desert. Come back after you've explored every inch of the desert, from Ariant to Magatia.
